message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm. I believe I can offer you a fair deal at $105.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $110. This offers a reasonable compromise while still saving you some money.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $112, but I'm still hoping we can get closer to my initial ask. Let's see if we can meet in the middle again.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the product's value and our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $110. This offers a fair compromise for both of us.
